verbs.description: russian olympics team in shock over [ARG1: games] [V: doping] scandal a russian olympic medallist has left the pyeongchang winter games on suspicion of doping a team official said on monday world anti doping agency maria sharapova moscow tennis viktoria moiseeva olympics konstantin vybornov south korea norway russia anastasia bryzgalova
